amount.description: The amount associated with the invoice item

metadata.description: Custom metadata associated with the invoice item.

plan.description: Information about the subscription plan associated with the invoice item.

tiers.description: Tiers within the plan that affect the pricing of the invoice item.

flat_amount.description: The flat amount for the tier

unit_amount.description: The unit amount for the tier

up_to.description: The maximum value of the tier

object.description: The object type of the plan

aggregate_usage.description: The usage aggregation rule for the plan

created.description: The creation timestamp of the plan

statement_description.description: The description on customer's statement for the plan

product.description: The product associated with the plan

statement_descriptor.description: The statement descriptor of the plan

interval_count.description: The number of intervals between plan charges

transform_usage.description: The transformation rules for usage allowed

interval.description: The billing interval of the plan

id.description: The unique identifier of the plan

trial_period_days.description: The trial period days for the plan

usage_type.description: The usage type allowed for the plan

active.description: Indicates if the plan is active

tiers_mode.description: The pricing mode for the tiers

billing_scheme.description: The billing scheme of the plan

livemode.description: Indicates if the plan is in live mode

currency.description: The currency code of the plan

metadata.description: Custom metadata associated with the plan.

updated.description: The last update timestamp of the plan

invoice.description: The invoice associated with the item

period.description: Period during which the invoice item applies.

end.description: The end date of the billing period

start.description: The start date of the billing period

description.description: A description of the invoice item

date.description: The date of the invoice item

updated.description: The last update timestamp of the invoice item

object.description: The object type of the item

subscription.description: The subscription associated with the item

id.description: The unique identifier of the invoice item

livemode.description: Indicates if the item is in live mode

discountable.description: Indicates if the item can be discounted

unit_amount.description: The unit amount of the invoice item

currency.description: The currency code of the amount

customer.description: The customer associated with the invoice item

proration.description: Indicates if the item is prorated

subscription_item.description: The subscription item related to the invoice item

price.description: The price of the invoice item

test_clock.description: A test clock for the item

discounts.description: Discount details applied to the invoice item.

items.description: Discount items applied to the invoice item

tax_rates.description: The tax rates applied to the item

unit_amount_decimal.description: The decimal unit amount of the invoice item

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the item is deleted
